API Management Service Instance.Naming convention: Alphanumeric and hyphen; no special characters allowed

Azure Analysis Services.Naming convention: Alphanumeric and hyphen; no special characters allowed

Azure Cache for Redis Instance.Naming convention: Alphanumeric only; no special characters allowed

Azure Cognitive Search.Naming convention: Alphanumeric only; no special characters allowed

Azure Cognitive Services.Naming convention: Alphanumeric and hyphen; no special characters allowed

Azure Container Registry.Naming convention: Alphanumeric only; no special characters allowed

Azure Cosmos DB Database.Naming convention: Alphanumeric and hyphen; no special characters allowed

Azure Data Factory.Naming convention: Alphanumeric and hyphen; no special characters allowed

Azure Machine Learning Workspace.Naming convention: Alphanumeric and hyphen; no special characters allowed

Azure SQL Database.Naming convention: Alphanumeric and special characters (_); no hyphens allowed

Azure StorSimple.Naming convention: Alphanumeric and hyphen; no special characters allowed

Azure Stream Analytics.Naming convention: Alphanumeric and hyphen; no special characters allowed

Data Lake Storage Account.Naming convention: Lowercase alphanumeric only; no special characters allowed

Function App.Naming convention: Alphanumeric and hyphen; no special characters allowed

IoT Hub.Naming convention: Alphanumeric and hyphen; no special characters allowed

Network Security Group (NSG).Naming convention: Alphanumeric and hyphen; no special characters allowed

Public IP Address.Naming convention: Alphanumeric and hyphen; no special characters allowed

Resource Group.Naming convention: Alphanumeric, underscore, parenthesis, hyphen, and period; no other special characters allowed

Route Table.Naming convention: Alphanumeric and hyphen; no special characters allowed

Service Bus.Naming convention: Alphanumeric and hyphen; no special characters allowed

Service Bus Queue.Naming convention: Alphanumeric, hyphen, and underscore; no other special characters allowed

Subnet.Naming convention: Alphanumeric and hyphen; no special characters allowed
